HiddenText.Name: If I am not interested in completing an applied associate’s degree, can I still take BYU-Idaho’s Family History Research courses?
HiddenText.OpenningText: If I am not interested in completing an applied associate’s degree, can I still take BYU-Idaho’s Family History Research courses?
HiddenText.BodyCopy: Any BYU-Idaho student can take these courses, whether or not they want a degree.  In addition to individual courses of interest, there are other options including a minor in Family History Research, a cluster in Family History Research, or a certificate in Family History Research.
